item.title: CuMo: Scaling Multimodal LLM with Co-Upcycled Mixture-of-Experts
item.description: CuMo boosts multimodal LLMs by efficiently integrating co-upcycled Mixture-of-Experts, achieving state-of-the-art performance with minimal extra parameters during inference.
